name: hesed-plugins
description: A collection of Claude plugins for common productivity and development workflows

plugins.name: google-chat
plugins.description: Send messages to Google Chat spaces and reply to threads

plugins.name: jira
plugins.description: Query, create, update, and manage Jira issues using JQL

plugins.name: confluence
plugins.description: Interact with Confluence pages, spaces, and comments

plugins.name: sql
plugins.description: Execute SQL queries on MySQL and PostgreSQL databases with built-in safety features

plugins.name: context7
plugins.description: Search and retrieve up-to-date documentation from Context7

plugins.name: sentry
plugins.description: Query, analyze, and manage Sentry issues, events, and projects
